mapper.insert: insert into message( msg_id , user_id, msg_time, catogry_id, msg, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time ) values( #{msgId}, #{userId}, SYSDATE(), #{catogryId}, #{msg}, #{createUser}, SYSDATE(), #{updateUser}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: select AUTO_INCREMENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME='message'
